SEARCH
Module com.example.dicegame
Package model.records.dice

Class DiceDeck

java.lang.Object
model.records.dice.DiceDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DiceDeck extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a collection of dice, referred to as a deck, that can be rolled together.

This class provides functionality to manage a deck of dice, including adding/removing dice, calculating the total balance of the dice in the deck, and rolling all the dice in the deck.

  • Method Details

    • getBalance

      public int getBalance()
      Calculates and returns the total balance of all the dice in the deck.

      This method sums up the balance values of each dice in the deck and returns the total balance.

      Returns:
      the total balance of the dice in the deck

    • addDice

      public void addDice(Dice dice)
      Adds a new dice to the deck.
      Parameters:
      dice - the Dice object to be added to the deck

    • removeDice

      public void removeDice(Dice dice)
      Removes the specified dice from the deck.
      Parameters:
      dice - the Dice object to be removed from the deck

    • roll

      public void roll()
      Rolls all the dice in the deck.

      This method invokes the Dice.roll() method on each dice in the deck, simulating a roll for all dice.

    • getDeck

      public List<Dice> getDeck()
      Returns the list of dice currently in the deck.
      Returns:
      a list of Dice objects in the deck

    • setDeck

      public void setDeck(List<Dice> deck)
      Sets the list of dice for the deck.
      Parameters:
      deck - the list of Dice objects to set for the deck
